name: Semantic Analysis
description: A set of system tests to verify, whether the the compile is able to perform a semantic analysis of a miniJ program

testCases.name: (Deklaration) Globale Variablen (ok)
testCases.input:
int number1;
int number2;

testCases.name: (Deklaration) Variablen (ok)
(Deklaration) Prozedur (ok)
testCases.input:
procedure test1()
begin
end
procedure test2()
begin
end

begin
